item.title: Here’s where Demi Moore gets a good night’s sleep: Her $3.6 million lakeside home in Idaho
item.description: Moore has a much quieter retreat away from the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles: a stunning lakehouse in Aspen Lakes, Idaho.

item.title: My friend’s partner is pregnant, but she’s married to another man. Is he financially responsible?
item.description: “She claimed her husband was cheating on her and stopped paying their mortgage.”
